about_the_game:
Mountain Top Castle Map Pack by Joshua Watmough


Mountain Top Castle Map Pack is a complete hand drawn battle map pack that spans more then 100 squares across all 7 levels.

From underground crypts to a 5 story keep and more this map pack will fill many nights of gaming with little prep time.

The pack has been divided into conveniently sized smaller more manageable maps for easy of use however included is two 1/4 sized full maps of the entire area one showing first level interiors and the other with appropriate roofs.

This pack includes the following maps (one with a grid and one without for each map):

  • Castle Well
  • Courtyard
  • Crypt
  • Crypt Entrance
  • Drawbridge
  • Guard Tower Cellar Jail
  • Guard Tower Floor 1
  • Guard Tower Floor 2
  • Guard Tower Floor 3
  • House 1
  • House 2
  • Keep Floor 1
  • Keep Floor 2
  • Keep Floor 3
  • Keep Floor 4
  • Keep Floor 5
  • Keep Roof
  • Mountaintop Castle Floor 1
  • Mountaintop Castle Top View
  • Root Cellar
  • Temple and House
  • Temple Floor 1
  • Temple Floor 2

Released on November 30, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
